title: Zeus, the Revolutionary Chief of the Gods
description:
This assignment was entitled: "Chart of the Gods Speech." 

In this speech, I talk about how Zeus and his revolutionary spirit is at the center of Greek Mythology. I thought I could have done better by having a memorized introduction and conclusion. The whole speech was extemporaneous.
